net.parallaxed.bluejam
Class HeuristicCollection

java.lang.Object
  java.util.AbstractCollection<E>
      java.util.AbstractList<E>
          java.util.ArrayList<Heuristic>
              net.parallaxed.bluejam.HeuristicCollection
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.lang.Iterable<Heuristic>, java.util.Collection<Heuristic>, java.util.List<Heuristic>, java.util.RandomAccess
public class HeuristicCollection
extends java.util.ArrayList<Heuristic>

Provides a class to store population heuristics and select them using different modes/distributions. Calling selectHeuristic() returns a heuristic from the collection. This class uses the ECJ implementation of MersenneTwisterFast.

Author:
Ciarán Rowe (csr2@kent.ac.uk)
See Also:
MersenneTwisterFast, Serialized Form

getHeuristic

public Heuristic getHeuristic(java.lang.String name)
Returns a heuristic by name if it is present in the collection.

Parameters:

Returns:
A reference to the named heuristic, or null.

public Heuristic selectHeuristic()

Returns:
